column1: Local Foods////If they had a downtown location
column2: I would eat lunch here everyday.  First off
column3: the staff was incredibly friendly and very personable.  They seemed very invested in the business and it reflected in their service.  The food was definitely excellent and at a decent price point.   I had the gulf shrimp and blue crab sandwich with sides of quinoa and beets.  The sandwich tasted very fresh and definitely satisfied my seafood craving.  The sides were brilliant - both the quinoa and beets were unique to me in their preparation and flavor profiles.  We had a few of mom's homemade desserts
column4: which were all gluttonously delicious.  I really need to come by again when i am in the area...
